node.title: Child among three who died in crash in Waimakariri District
node.description: The three people who died in a crash just north of Christchurch on Sunday have been named.
node.content:
["The three people who died in a crash just north of Christchurch on Sunday have been named.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Richard Tindiller\n
", "They were Jixuan Yinwho, 67, Ying Wan, 48, and Guhan, also known as Caroline, Yin who was eight.", "They all lived in Christchurch.", "The crash happened after a truck and car collided at the intersection of South Eyre Road and Burnt Hill Road, in the Waimakariri District.", "Police said a fourth person, who was seriously injured in the crash, remains in hospital in a stable condition.", "The investigation into the crash is ongoing."]
